greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter (2-adic valuation of n & 4k+1,4k+3 prime-signature combination of 2n-1): a(n) = P(A001511(n), A286364((2*n)-1)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
Indranil Ghosh, Python program to generate the sequence
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 10 2017
